channel.title: I replaced bones with seren statue help
channel.description: i wanted to make a basic pvp drop system so i replaced when someone dies to drop a seren statue and now when ever u die anywhere it drops one i forgot how i did this anyone know HOW TO Change when you die what drops under you such as bones

item.title: I replaced bones with seren statue help
item.dc:creator: @ProjectDarkSouls ProjectDarkSouls
item.description:
@ProjectDarkSouls wrote:

PM me with your teamviewer ID and password and I will show you,

Also if you are not using Eclipse I highly recommend you download and use it.
